GSD.description:
ntfs: check overflow when iterating ATTR_RECORDs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 45683723f6b53e39e8a4cec0894e61fd6ec71989. For more details please see the references link.
